info.title: Request for Quotation
info.description: This service enables you to read, update, delete and create a request for quotation from an external system in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. The service contains header, item and bidder. The information is sent in the request as a payload. All information is utilized when creating an RFQ with appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update, delete and create a request for quotation from an external system in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system

values.text: [Sourcing with SAP Ariba Sourcing(1A0)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1A0 " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET RequestForQuotation HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
